model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Model

  • public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing game data model.
    Author:
    Stanislav Smatana, Dominika Fabcinova

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model()
      Creates new game model with one desk and blank history.
      Model(History hist)
      Constructor constructs model from existing history of turns.
      Model(java.lang.String xml_str)
      Constructs model from given xml string.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model()
        Creates new game model with one desk and blank history. Desk has figures on as in started game.

      • Model

        public Model(java.lang.String xml_str)
      throws IllegalTurnException,
             DocumentException
        Constructs model from given xml string.
        Parameters:
        xml_str - Valid xml string
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException
        DocumentException

      • Model

        public Model(History hist)
      throws IllegalTurnException
        Constructor constructs model from existing history of turns.
        Parameters:
        hist - History to create model from.
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException - If history contains illegal turn.

        Parameters:
        t - Turn object.
        Returns:
        False on illegal move, true otherwise

      • areJumps

        public boolean areJumps(Figure.Color col)
        Method determines if there are any jumps for given color on actual desk.
        Parameters:
        col - Color to check for
        Returns:
        True if there are, false otherwise

      • isJump

        public boolean isJump(Turn t)
        Method determines if given move is jump.
        Parameters:
        t - Move to be checked
        Returns:
        True if it is jump, false otherwise.
